messages.title: A RECORD OF DELIVERY
messages.content: Derek has a strong track record of getting things done for West Cornwall and The Isles of Scilly.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: HEALTH - Delivering the hospital our community deserves
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Derek has successfully campaigned for a brand new hospital in Penzance which is on track to be delivered in the near future.
Derek has worked to secure almost £14 million to improve school buildings across West Cornwall and on Scilly.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: TRANSPORT - Mainline train sleeper service secured
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Following Derek’s work, the future of the Night Riviera Sleeper service has been secured.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: ECONOMY - Funding to fix mobile not-spots
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secured £4.25 million from the government to improve mobile coverage across West Cornwall and Scilly.
Derek has been clear that he will honour the result of the Referendum and has remained committed to ensuring Brexit works for Cornwall and Scilly.

mentions.tacticalSituation: YOUR CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION - STRONG, STABLE LEADERSHIP IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST with Theresa May and her local candidate Derek Thomas - or a coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.

issues.brexitEurope: Derek has been clear that he will honour the result of the Referendum and has remained committed to ensuring Brexit works for Cornwall and Scilly.

quotes.text: I'm backing Derek again... he has a strong track record of delivery for West Cornwall and The Isles of Scilly.
